title: Live updates: Trump pardons turkeys ahead of Thanksgiving
description: Sparing a bird ahead of the holiday is a time-honoured US presidential tradition.
content:
In pictures: Past presidents and their turkeys
Perhaps some of the most awkward photographs taken of US Presidents are them interacting with very large birds.
Though the annual tradition of turkey pardoning did not become official until George H W Bu... [6352 chars]

title: Millions of UK workers to get pay rise as Reeves plans increased minimum wage
description: Chancellor says people must be ‘properly rewarded for their hard work’ with 16- to 21-year-olds also in line for raise
content:
Millions of low-paid workers in the UK are to get a pay rise of 4.1% next year, as Rachel Reeves confirmed that minimum wage rates will go up as part of the government’s ambition to improve living standards.
The national living wage will rise from £1... [4662 chars]

title: Rachel Reeves will be hoping this Budget buys her some time
description: Deep unpopularity in the country and jittery Labour MPs is the prism through which both the countdown to this Budget and its aftermath should be seen.
content:
Finally, after weeks - even months - of hearing about it, we are about to find out what is actually in this year's Budget.
Chancellor Rachel Reeves will make an argument about what she will call "the fair and necessary choices" she is taking.
Necessa... [4100 chars]

title: Man guilty of chasing Police Scotland officer with chainsaw in murder attempt
description: PC Gary Cowan said he was "terrified" when he found himself being chased by Liridon Kastrati, 32, in Paisley last year.
content:
An Albanian man has been found guilty of chasing a police officer with a chainsaw in an attempt to murder him.
Liridon Kastrati, 32, had been accused of attempting to kill four officers, but on Tuesday was convicted of an amended charge of attempted ... [3082 chars]

title: Teenager arrested after 16-year-old shot in Sheffield
description: A 15-year-old is held on suspicion of conspiracy to commit murder. The victim was taken to hospital where he remains in a critical condition.
content:
A 15-year-old boy has been arrested after a 16-year-old boy was shot in Sheffield, police said.
The incident happened shortly before 5.20pm in London Road on Monday, a busy city-centre route during rush hour.
The victim was taken to hospital, where h... [1310 chars]
